entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmp5k94z3ug\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0013.2781] It is expected that us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsOther with a value of -0.048 will be reported with a value equal to or greater than zero if net income before tax is positive. In this case net income before tax is 569,700,000. The value reported for the tax rate reconciliation item is less than zero. The preparer should consider if the value is input correctly for this assertion and, after considering the appropriateness of the input, if incorrect, input the amount as a positive (i.e., absolute) value and provide a negated label, if desired, for rendering purposes.
The properties of this us-gaap:EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxCreditsOther fact are: Period :2017-01-01 to 2017-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : pure Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/1021635/000102163520000016/oge-20191231.htm 4

property.name: label
property.value: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
